definitions.body: (sacred; but perh. orig. [[קֶדֶשׁ]] and pointing artif. to disting. fr. ´[[ק]]: in N);—

Kadhv: in S. of Judah Ge 16:14 (J), Ge 20:1 (E), in [[מִדְבַּר פָּארָן]] Nu 13:26 (P), specif. [[חִן]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 20:1, Nu 33:36, cf. [[קָדֵשׁ]] ´[[מ]]: Ps 29:8; on W. border of Edom Nu 20:16 (E), Nu 33:37 (P), cf. Nu 20:14 (E), v:Nu 20:22 (P), Ju Jdg 11:16, Jdg 11:17 (hence Rob:BR ii. 175, 194 sought it at ‘Ain Weibeh, in W. of Arabah); long adobe of Isr. during Exod. De 1:46; ´[[מֵי מְרִיבַת ק]]: Nu 27:14 (cf. Nu 20:1-13), De 32:51 (P), Ez Eze 47:19 (rd. [[מְרִיבַת]]), Eze 48:28, cf. De 33:2 (v. [[קׂדֶשׁ]] ad fin.); cf. [[עֵין מִשְׁפָּט]] Ge 14:7; = [[בַּרְנֵעַ]] ´[[ק]]: (meaning of ´[[ב]]: unknown; LXX K. (tou=) barnh);—Nu 32:8 (J), De 1:2, De 1:19, De 2:14, De 9:23, Jos 10:41 (D), Nu 34:4, Jos 15:3 (P);—mod. ‘Ain Ḳaîs (kudais, qudays), c. 50 miles S. of. Beersheba, J Rowlands (1842) v. Gwilliams:Holy City, 464 f., and especially HCTrumbull (1881):Kadesh Barnea, 238–321.

Hittite capital on the Orontes, N. of Damascus, towards Hamath (Eg. Ḳdš, Ḳdšu, Ḳdšë, WMM:As. u. Eur. 213 ff.);—2Sa 24:6 LXXL We Dr Kit Bu Löhr, rdg. [[אֶרֶץ הַחִתִּים קָדֵ֫שָׁה]] for MT [[תַּחְתִּים חָדְשִׁי]] ´[[א]]: ([[הַחִתִּים]] already Hi:Gesch. Isr. i. 29; [[קָדֵ֫שָׁה]] Th, [[קֶ֫דְשָׁה]] Klo, of [[קֶדֶשׁ]] in Napht.); HPS doubts.
